name: Easy Pinwheels with Cream Cheese and Cranberries
author: LaurasFaves
summary: You will only need 3 ingredients for this delicious appetizer that's a great way to use up leftover cranberry sauce from Thanksgiving.
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Unroll dough on a lightly floured surface
Press dough together at the seams so you have 2 rectangles
Combine cream cheese and cranberry sauce in a bowl; mix together until completely blended
Spread cream cheese mixture over each rectangle, leaving a 1/4-inch border on all sides
Roll each rectangle into a log, starting at the shorter side, and cut into 6 slices
Place pinwheels cut-sides up on an ungreased baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes
Let stand on the baking sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool
